### Pace Calculation Helpers

```plaintext
# Minutes (there's no floor fn so just grab it yourself...)
(($MIN + $SEC/60) / $DISTANCE)

# Seconds
((($MIN + $SEC/60) / $DISTANCE) % 1) * 60
```
